Description.description: A string containing the description of the group.
Description.markdownDescription:
A string containing the description of the group.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 1024  

Pattern: ^[\p{L}\p{M}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}\t\n\r  　]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

DisplayName.description: A string containing the name of the group. This value is commonly displayed when the group is referenced.
DisplayName.markdownDescription:
A string containing the name of the group. This value is commonly displayed when the group is referenced.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 1024  

Pattern: ^[\p{L}\p{M}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}\t\n\r  ]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

GroupId.description: The unique identifier for a group in the identity store.
GroupId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier for a group in the identity store.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 47  

Pattern: ^([0-9a-f]{10}-|)[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}$  

Update requires: No interruption

IdentityStoreId.description: The globally unique identifier for the identity store.
IdentityStoreId.markdownDescription:
The globally unique identifier for the identity store.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 36  

Pattern: ^d-[0-9a-f]{10}$|^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$  

Update requires: No interruption
